databaseConfig.sql:
SELECT MS_SENIN_ETC.MS_SENIN_ID ,
MS_SENIN_ETC.BANK_NAME1 , MS_SENIN_ETC.BRANCH_NAME1 , MS_SENIN_ETC.ACCOUNT_NO1 ,
MS_SENIN_ETC.BANK_NAME2 , MS_SENIN_ETC.BRANCH_NAME2 , MS_SENIN_ETC.ACCOUNT_NO2 ,
MS_SENIN_ETC.HEIGHT , MS_SENIN_ETC.WEIGHT , MS_SENIN_ETC.WAIST , MS_SENIN_ETC.INSEAM , MS_SENIN_ETC.SHOE_SIZE , MS_SENIN_ETC.WORKWEAR ,
MS_SENIN_ETC.DELETE_FLAG , MS_SENIN_ETC.SEND_FLAG , MS_SENIN_ETC.VESSEL_ID , MS_SENIN_ETC.DATA_NO , MS_SENIN_ETC.USER_KEY , MS_SENIN_ETC.RENEW_DATE , MS_SENIN_ETC.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_SENIN_ETC.TS
FROM MS_SENIN_ETC
WHERE MS_SENIN_ETC.DELETE_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO MS_SENIN_ETC(
MS_SENIN_ID ,
BANK_NAME1, BRANCH_NAME1, ACCOUNT_NO1, BANK_NAME2, BRANCH_NAME2, ACCOUNT_NO2, HEIGHT, WEIGHT, WAIST, INSEAM, SHOE_SIZE, WORKWEAR,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES(
:MS_SENIN_ID ,
:BANK_NAME1, :BRANCH_NAME1, :ACCOUNT_NO1, :BANK_NAME2, :BRANCH_NAME2, :ACCOUNT_NO2, :HEIGHT, :WEIGHT, :WAIST, :INSEAM, :SHOE_SIZE, :WORKWEAR,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_SENIN_ETC SET
BANK_NAME1 = :BANK_NAME1 ,BRANCH_NAME1 = :BRANCH_NAME1 ,ACCOUNT_NO1 = :ACCOUNT_NO1 ,BANK_NAME2 = :BANK_NAME2 ,BRANCH_NAME2 = :BRANCH_NAME2 ,ACCOUNT_NO2 = :ACCOUNT_NO2 ,HEIGHT = :HEIGHT ,WEIGHT = :WEIGHT ,WAIST = :WAIST ,INSEAM = :INSEAM ,SHOE_SIZE = :SHOE_SIZE ,WORKWEAR = :WORKWEAR
,DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG ,SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG ,VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID ,DATA_NO = :DATA_NO ,USER_KEY = :USER_KEY ,RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE ,RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID ,TS = :TS
WHERE MS_SENIN_ID = :MS_SENIN_ID AND TS = :TS
